topic.title: A program that captures keyboard shortcuts used and announces combos in Killer Instinct fashion
topic.body:
Hi, I hope this is the right place. 

I wonder if there exists, or if any developers like the idea enough to create it. It's essentially a keylogger, so I know it's a bit weird. But yeah, the idea is exactly as above: it's just a small program running, and when you hit a nice combo (you can set the minimum) of keyboard shortcuts, an announcer yells something like "Monster Combo!" and a counter and the work "Monster Combo!" appear at the top left of your screen for a short while then disappear. Something to that effect is what I'm thinking.

Thoughts?
